game.name: Alterfauna: A Weirdlife Park
game.shortDescription: Join Neli as she takes her first steps in the Alterfauna (super)natural preserve. Attract, tame, and photograph over 40 species of hand-painted creatures, fantastic monsters and ferocious beasts. Your new friends will accompany you as you discover a world full of magic.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join Neli as she takes her first steps in the Alterfauna (super)natural preserve. Attract, tame, and photograph over 40 species of hand-painted creatures, fantastic monsters and ferocious beasts. Your new friends will accompany you as you discover a world full of magic.
